data.meta_description: Anne Jeffreys appeared on daytime beginning in 1984 as Amanda Barrington on General Hospital. Jeffreys was a regular cast member until 1987 when the character was written off. data.text:
Full Name

Anne Jeffreys Carmichael

Birthdate

January 26, 1923

Birthplace

Goldsboro, North Carolina, USA

Date of Death

September 27, 2017 (age 94)

Occupation

Actress

Years Active

1984-2004

Anne Jeffreys appeared on daytime beginning in 1984 as Amanda Barrington on General Hospital. Jeffreys was a regular cast member until 1987 when the character was written off. Jeffreys returned in 1998 when Amanda's granddaughter Allison (Erin Hershey Presley) was introduced and crossed over to Port Charles. Jeffreys' made a number of guest appearances during the run of Port Charles. In 2004, Jeffreys returned to GH for Lila's funeral. Aside from daytime, Jeffreys has a number of credits to her name including episodes of Falcon Crest, Fantasy Island and Topper. Jeffreys' recently appeared in a 2013 episode of Getting On. Jeffreys died on September 27, 2017 at age 94.

Personal Life[]

Jeffreys was married twice. Jeffreys' first marriage was to Joseph Robert Serena from 1945 to 1951 and it was annulled. Jeffreys was married to Robert Sterling from 1951 until his death in 2006. Jeffreys and Sterling had three children: Robert Dana (b. 09/15/1958), Tyler Marcus (b. 11/23/1959) and Jeffrey.

Soapography[]

Amanda Barrington on General Hospital (02/16/1984-1987; 1998; 07/16/2004)

Amanda Barrington on Port Charles (Between 1999-2003)

Awards and Nominations[]

Golden Globe Awards

Year Category Series W/N 1973 Best TV Actress - Drama The Delphi Bureau

Hollywood Walk of Fame

Star awarded on February 8, 1960 at 1501 Vine Street.
